# columnSelection

**Instance Property**

The selection of columns to concatenate.

## Declaration

```swift
var columnSelection: ColumnSelection
```

## Getting the properties

- **concatenatedColumnName**: The name of the concatenated column containing the shaped arrays.

items.description: The name of the concatenated column containing the shaped arrays.
